graph_title: Degree of integrated water resources management
indicator_name: Degree of integrated water resources management
SDG_GOAL: Goal 6: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
SDG_TARGET: Target 6.5: By 2030, implement integrated water resources management at all levels, including through transboundary cooperation as appropriate
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 6.5.1: Degree of integrated water resources management implementation
STAT_CONC_DEF: Indicator 6.5.1 is ‘degree of integrated water resources management implementation’. It measures the stages of development and implementation of Integrated Water Resources Management (IWRM), on a scale of 0 to 100, in six categories (see Rationale section). The indicator score is calculated from a country survey with 33 questions, with each question scored on the same scale of 0-100.
SDG_GOAL__GLOBAL: Goal 6: Ensure availability and sustainable management of water and sanitation for all
SDG_TARGET__GLOBAL: Target 6.5: By 2030, implement integrated water resources management at all levels, including through transboundary cooperation as appropriate
SDG_INDICATOR__GLOBAL: Indicator 6.5.1: Degree of integrated water resources management implementation
